name: Where Foxes Say Goodnight
description:
Where Foxes Say Goodnight is a relaxing camping game made by SukkoyF and Vildravn for the Great Autumn Game Jam: 2021.

There is no fail state, just pure vibes and chill.

The name of the game comes from a Czech idiom - "Tam, kde dávají lišky dobrou noc". It's used to describe a remote, deserted place. A place so isolated (and peaceful!) that even foxes have nothing to say to it than goodnight.

Controls
  • Movement: Arrow keys or WASD (ZQSD on AZERTY keyboards)
  • Select card, Pick up item, Use card on item: Left mouse click
  • Place card on the ground: Right mouse click
